S06n626:1: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat -uttrasiṣyanti bhagavan asminnirdeśe adhimānikā nimittacāriṇa iti |
S06n626:10: adhimānaprajñayā niradhimānatāṃ gaveṣante mānaprahāṇaṃ ca gaveṣante |
S06n626:11: ye punarāyuṣmānnānanda mānaṃ nopalabhante na samanupaśyanti na manyante nābhiniviśante,
S06n626:14: na ca āyuṣmānnānanda adhimānikānāmarthāya iyaṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā |
S06n626:22: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda nāpi samamupalabhante na viṣamam,
S06n626:25: na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante ||
S06n626:29: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānīyā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06n626:37: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda bodhisattvā nimittāpagatā animittacāriṇo'nānātvacāriṇo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvatyantameva niryātāḥ,
S06n626:41: teṣāmeṣu evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu na dhandhāyitatvaṃ na kāṅkṣāyitatvam |
S06n626:43: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi te'nulomaṃ sthitāḥ, na vilomam |
S06n626:51: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāmudāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhadharmeṣu cittaṃ krāmati |
S06n626:55: śuddheyamānanda parṣat pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitā gambhīradharmādhimuktikā gambhīradharmacaritā |
S06n626:56: viśvasto hi ānanda tathāgato'syāṃ parṣadi prasahya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06n626:63: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda yadā anavatapto nāgarājaḥ pramudito bhavati prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S06n626:67: te'pi pramuditāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanto mahāvṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06n626:68: evameva ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjato ya ime jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06n626:69: te'pi iha lokadhātau svakasvakāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi gatvā imaṃ dharmasamudayamārabhya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ purastānmahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06n626:71: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda sāgaro nāgarājo yadā pramudito bhavati,
S06n626:73: ye ca tatra bhavane naivāsikā nāgā bhavanti,
S06n626:76: tābhiśca te varṣadhārābhiḥ sukhaṃ ca saṃjānante |
S06n626:81: asahyā hi ānanda tā varṣadhārā anyairnāgaiḥ |
S06n626:85: ye ca tathāgatasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṛtakuśalamūlā udārāśayā gambhīradharmanayanirjātāḥ,
S06n626:87: śrutvā udagrāḥ prītāḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānante |
S06n626:88: idamānanda tathāgato'rthavaśaṃ saṃpratītya śuddhāyāṃ parṣadi mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadati,
S06n626:94: te khalu evaṃ saṃvibhaktāstasya rājñaścakravartino'ntike bhūyasyā mātrayā adhikaṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca saṃjanayeyuḥ,
S06n626:96: evameva ānanda tathāgato'pi dharmarājā dharmasvāmī svayaṃbhūrimān putrān saṃnipātya imaṃ dharmaratnagañjaṃ saṃvibhajati ebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ,
S06n626:98: te mamāntike bhūyasyā mātrayā prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti,
S06n626:100: na śakyamānanda anyaiḥ sattvairidaṃ dharmaratnaṃ hīnādhimuktikairadhimānikairdṛṣṭicaritairnimittacaritairupalambhadṛṣṭicaritairasmimānahatai rāgadveṣamohābhibhūtairutpathaprayātaiḥ |
S06n626:101: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakravartidhanaṃ rocate |
S06n626:104: kimānanda daridrasattvānāṃ cakraratnena vā hastiratnena vā aśvaratnena vā maṇiratnena vā strīratnena vā gṛhapatiratnena vā pariṇāyakaratnena vā udārairvā vastraiḥ,
S06n626:106: yāni labdhvāpi prītā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum |
S06n626:110: nāpyānanda daridrasattvā ratnānyapi prajānanti - asya ratnasyedaṃ nāmeti |
S06n626:111: evameva ānanda ye tathāgatasya putrā dṛṣṭasatyā bodhisattvāśca mahāsattvāḥ,
S06n626:115: kimānanda daridrasattvāḥ śrutavihīnāḥ śrutavipratipannā bālā acakṣuṣmantaḥ anena dharmaratnakośena kariṣyanti ?
S06n626:116: labdhvā cojjhiṣyanti anyebhyo'pi vā dātavyaṃ maṃsyante |
S06n626:117: na hi ānanda caṇḍālā vā pukkasā vā veṇukārā vā,
S06n626:118: ye vā kecidanye daridrajīvinaḥ sattvāḥ udāraṃ ratnaṃ labdhvā svayaṃ paribhuñjate |
S06n626:119: te samardhaṃ vā vikrīṇanti ujjhanti vā |
S06n626:122: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānāmetadadhivacanaṃ dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāmaupalambhikānāṃ bandhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nimittacaritānāmutpathaprayātānām,
S06n626:123: ye khalu ānanda idaṃ dharmaratnaṃ labdhvā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum,
S06n626:131: na hi ānanda śṛgālaḥ siṃhanādaṃ paribhuṅkte |
S06n626:137: ye punarānanda samyaksaṃbuddhasya potakāḥ mahābuddhasiṃhena svayaṃ bhuñjānenotpāditāḥ,
S06n626:140: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatpariśuddheyaṃ tathāgatasya parṣat saṃnipatitā |
S06n626:143: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-guṇāṃstvaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadaḥ parikīrtayasi |
S06n626:144: āha-na hyasyā bhagavan parṣado mayā śakyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum |
S06n626:148: na hyasyāḥ parṣado guṇānāmantaḥ śakyo'dhigantuṃ samyaksaṃbuddhairapi,
S06n626:152: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā |
S06n626:156: avaśyaṃ hi evaṃrūpāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃnipāto bhavati |
S06n626:157: ye'pyanye śāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ imaṃ sarvasaṃśayocchedanaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
